sentences: SBI Chair Daniela Stoycheva (Bulgaria) opened SBI-21.
Delegates adopted the agenda (FCCC/SBI/2004/11) without amendment.
On election of officers, Emilio Sempris (Panama) will replace Gonzalo Menéndez (Panama) as SBI Rapporteur, and Fadhel Lari (Kuwait) will continue to serve as SBI Vice-Chair.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
